classification.task_goal: Implement an end-to-end program execution pipeline that compiles source code to runtime backend objects and runs the compiled program.
primary_constraints: Implement a grammar in src/PL.g4 to support the minimal features required to run the four programs given in this worksheet.
Implement several Kotlin classes in src/backend.kt for the compiled runtime backend objects and the visitor class that performs compilation using SDD.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially provided a response that did not fully adhere to the user's constraints regarding the implementation of the grammar and backend classes. However, the user later clarified the requirements, prompting the AI to adjust its responses accordingly.
